
--- Part 1 ---

```{r}
p1 <- input |> 
  str_extract_all("[\\-|\\d]+") |> 
  unlist() |> 
  as.numeric() |> 
  sum(na.rm = TRUE)

p1
```

--- Part 2 ---

```{r}
p2 <- jsonlite::parse_json(input)

has_red_property <- \(x) {
  any(x[names(x)] == "red")
}

add_num <- function(x){
  
  if(is.list(x) && has_red_property(x)) return(0)
  
  if(is.list(x)) return(lapply(x, add_num))
  
  if(is.numeric(x)) return(x)
  
  return(0) 
}

add_num(p2) |> unlist() |> sum()
```
